history.narrative: Law 20-127, the “Traffic Adjudication Amendment Act of 2013,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-324. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 8, 2014, and May 6, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 30, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-344 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-127 became effective on July 23, 2014.
